US BANK HOLIDAY: July 4, 2022 – USD payments paused
Bitstamp USD payments paused on Monday, July 4, 2022, due to a public holiday in the US.

Due to Independence Day in the US on  July 4, 2022, Bitstamp’s bank payment clearing system for incoming and outgoing USD payments will be paused.

USD deposits and withdrawals will be processed the next business day – on Tuesday, July 5, 2022.

EUR and GBP deposits and withdrawals will be processed without interruptions.

If you need any help, please contact us at support@bitstamp.net.

We wish our US customers a very happy 4th of July!
